Package net.finmath.montecarlo.assetderivativevaluation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BachelierModelMonteCarloValuationTest
    This class represents a collection of several "tests" illustrating different aspects related to the Monte-Carlo Simulation and derivative valuation (using a simple Bachelier model).
    BlackScholesMonteCarloValuationTest
    This class represents a collection of several "tests" illustrating different aspects related to the Monte-Carlo Simulation and derivative valuation (using a simple Black-Scholes model.
    DisplacedLognomalModelTest  
    HestonModelTest  
    InhomogenousBachelierModelMonteCarloValuationTest
    This class represents a collection of several "tests" illustrating different aspects related to the Monte-Carlo Simulation and derivative pricing (using a simple Bachelier model).

    MonteCarloBlackScholesModelAsianOptionSensitivitiesTest
